^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NVLinkErrors.description: The NVLink errors associated with this port.
NVLinkErrors.longDescription: This property shall contain properties that describe the NVLink errors associated with this port.

RXNoProtocolBytes.description: The received NVLink data throughput without the protocol overhead.
RXNoProtocolBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the received NVLink data throughput without the protocol overhead.

TXNoProtocolBytes.description: The transmitted NVLink data throughput without the protocol overhead.
TXNoProtocolBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the transmitted NVLink data throughput without the protocol overhead.
